body.name: PAUDIN Nakiri Knife - 7" Razor Sharp Meat Cleaver and Vegetable Kitchen Knife, High Carbon Stainless Steel, Multipurpose Asian Chef Knife for Home and Kitchen with Ergonomic Handle
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 45 mins
features: ALL-PURPOSE NAKIRI KNIFE: The classic 7 inch kitchen knife is flexible for all kinds of heavy duty preps, like slicing, dicing, chopping and mincing. A truly all-around cooking knife, is easy to re-sharpen, clean and maintain.

ULTRA SHARP EDGE: The blade of PAUDIN cleavers is made of 5Cr15Mov stainless steel (not real Damascus) with 56+ hardness. The razor sharp cutting edge allows you to cut foods effortlessly. All the world-renowned cutlery brands adopt the same steel, which is rust -proof and durable for long time use.

ERGONOMIC HANDLE: The ergonomics shape perfect balances the handle and the thin blade at the pinch point, ensures the ease of movement. The soft pakkawood handle is integrated with the Japanese nakiri knife's blade, creating comfortable grip.
WAVE PATTERN: The special waved pattern is strikingly beautiful like a Damascus knife. It decreases food friction and makes the vegetable cleaver easy to clean and maintain.

ELEGANT GIFT: This meat vetetable chef knife is a best gift with beautiful packing for Christmas, Weddings, Birthdays, Father's Day, Mother's Day! We Offer 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK policy. PAUDIN provides a lifetime against defects in material and workmanship.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: N1 Chef Knife Kitchen Knife Set N8 Paring Knife N9 Carving Knife N10 Boning Knife S3 Steak Knife Set of 6 Size 8 Inch 3.5 - 8 Inch 3.5 Inch 8 Inch 6 Inch 4.5 Inch Type of Steel 5Cr15MoV Stainless Steel 5Cr15MoV Stainless Steel 5Cr15MoV Stainless Steel 5Cr15MoV Stainless Steel 5Cr15MoV Stainless Steel 5Cr15MoV Stainless Steel Handle Material Pakkawood Pakkawood Pakkawood Pakkawood Pakkawood Pakkawood Gift Box ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Lifetime Aftersales ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

PAUDIN - Enjoy Cooking with us! This 7'' nakiri knife is forged from stainless steel (5Cr15Mov - the best blade material for most of kitchen knives). The high carbon makes the meat and vegetable cleaver higher hardness (HRC 56+ ), stronger toughness, better corrosion resistance, superior performance and long working life. Precision forging engineering makes the steel more pure and stable, reducing the edge blunt or dull. PAUDIN cleaver knife can handle all kitchen tasks, chopping, slicing, mincing and dicing. It is suitable for vegetables, fruits, meats and other ingredients. Pakka wood handle is comfortable, non-slip and easy to control.

Razor Sharp & Durable Made of premium high carbon stainless steel (1.4116/5Cr15MoV), the Japanese style cooking knife has reliable performance and durable life. Precision forged blade has high ability of anti-corrosion, anti-rusty, and stain resistant. With 15 degree cutting edge and extreme hardness of HRC56+, this ultra sharp knife makes every cut and slice happy. Comfortable Use The ergonomic shape enables superior control and perfect balance between comfortable handle and the thin blade, ensuring ease of movement. The handle of this meat cleaver is made of non-slip pakka wood to ensure safety, effectively reduce fatigue caused by prolonged use. High density of the elegant Pakkawood handle is oilproof and anti-corrosion. Multifunctional Knife With the wide blade of the cleaver and the versatility of chef's knife, it is an essential tool for precision preps work at home kitchen and restaurant. PAUDIN nakiri knife can handles all ingredients, like vegetables, fruits and meats. And work on many tasks like slicing thin or thick, cutting large or small cubes.

TIPS * Most importantly- to avoid rust, it should be wiped dry. * Dish detergent can be used. * Hand wash recommend - no dishwasher. * Do not cut bones with nakiri knife. * Don’t use the knife as can opener.

PAUDIN STORY One of emerging global brand, PAUDIN has synonymous with superior quality products with a young and very motivated team. The start-up has used innovative technologies to build highest quality and most appealing design. PAUDIN works with the young talents who shared the brand’s value and vision, then and now, commit to make customer satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-Quality (Razor-Sharp) Knife at an affordable price!
reviews.reviewText: The PAUDIN Nakiri Knife has truly exceeded my expectations as a versatile kitchen essential.As someone who has never owned a knife of this type before, I am thoroughly impressed with its performance. The 7" Razor Sharp Meat Cleaver and Vegetable Kitchen Knife feature a stunning damascus steel blade with intricate markings that not only contribute to its functionality but also add an elegant touch to my kitchen. The attractive wood handle provides a comfortable and secure grip, making slicing, dicing, and chopping a breeze.One of the standout features of this knife is its razor-sharp edge, which effortlessly cuts through meat and vegetables with precision. The damascus steel blade not only enhances its sharpness but also ensures durability for long-term use.I appreciate the inclusion of a blade cover, providing protection when the knife is not in use and adding an extra layer of safety. The PAUDIN Nakiri Knife has become an indispensable tool in my kitchen, and I highly recommend it to anyone in search of a high-quality, aesthetically pleasing knife that delivers outstanding performance in both meat and vegetable preparation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great knife and price
reviews.reviewText: Really nice, sharp, well made knife. It comes in a beautiful box to protect it, and it's a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This knife is sweet!
reviews.reviewText: I've read about Chinese knives but never owned one. Since I read various sources that expounded on the wonders and versatility of the cleavers, I decided to try one. This cleaver epitomizes the characteristics that I read - chops vegetables with ease, parries, and is comfortable! Unlike many cleavers this one has the "hook hole" and a somewhat rounded blade for old school chef chopping. The 7" blade may be a drawback to some buyers but the weight is nice. It's easy to handle but still has plenty of blade for whatever needs to be cut. I've had the cleaver for a couple of weeks and LOVE it! We'll see how it holds up long term but so far, I love this knife and it has become my go to knife instead of my Wusthofs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent deal for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have SHAWN can onion knives and prefer some of these knives over those. Balances very nice handles very nice blades are very thin and easy to use. Made of very good steel and stay sharp a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and well made
reviews.reviewText: Very sharp and a decent handle grip as well. I'd give it a 5 if it was a little heavier balance-wise, but for the price it's a wonderful knife that I have continuously used since getting it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best knife Ive ever had 100% reccomend
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this knife is amazing the feel of the handle, the weight of the blade, the look, and this thing is razor sharp straight out of its packaging. One of the best parts was when i found out it came with a good blade cover so its easy to store without damaging anything. One last thing id like to add is that the packaging is perfect small and easy to open while also looking great. I will definitely be getting the rest of the set over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It fits well in the hand and has superb quality. I have to be super careful while using it because it could do a lot of damage. My only problem with it is that it does come with a sturdy sheath - only a flimsy thin plastic sleeve which clearly will fall apart. It will not fit in any butcher blocks that I have and it has to be laid flat in a drawer which is not ideal. The cutting/slicing quality of the blade is a miracle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really like this knife. Very light weight, comfortable and very sharp. Highly recommend and I took my other knife back that I bought which was a cleaver type.
